entities.name: executioner

entities.name: ron

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who wants to save Hagrid from execution.

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who will be angry if he sees Harry near the place where the Invisibility Cloak is kept.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as something that could help Harry and his friends save Hagrid.

entities.name: fat lady's portrait
entities.description: The Fat Lady's portrait is mentioned as a way to access the place where the Invisibility Cloak is kept.

entities.name: one-eyed witch
entities.description: The one-eyed witch is mentioned as someone who has a hump that can be opened with a password.

relationships.description: Harry wants to use the Invisibility Cloak to save Hagrid.
Hermione opens the Fat Lady's portrait to access the place where the Invisibility Cloak is kept.
Harry left the Invisibility Cloak in the passageway under the one-eyed witch.
Snape will see Harry if he goes near the place where the Invisibility Cloak is kept.
Hermione finds the Invisibility Cloak in the passageway under the one-eyed witch.
